com.gensym.classes
Class ClassFriendAccess

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.gensym.classes.ClassFriendAccess
public final class ClassFriendAccess
extends Object
implements ClassFriendAccessor

This class extends access to package private data to the Stub generation and loading classes.

Method Detail

register

public final boolean register(Symbol className_,
                              Class clazz)
registers the Class as having been loaded. The class-specific data in the interface is read and stored. It is then possible to access information regarding this class.
Specified by:
register in interface ClassFriendAccessor
Parameters:
clazz - the Class to register
Returns:
a boolean specifying whether all superior interfaces of this class had already been registered.
See Also:
getClassInheritancePath(com.gensym.util.Symbol), getDirectSuperiorClasses(com.gensym.util.Symbol)

register

public void register(Symbol className,
                     Symbol[] inheritancePath,
                     Symbol[] staticAttributes)
registers the information for the G2 class named by className.
Specified by:
register in interface ClassFriendAccessor
Parameters:
className - a symbol naming a G2 class
inheritancePath - the linearized inheritance path for className
staticAttributes - the list of attributes defined at className
